newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank reserves firm to $3.67 bln - Sept 25.
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank reserves firm to $3.67 bln - Sept 25.

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) on Monday said its hard currency reserves firmed to $3.673 billion as of September 25, from $3.665 billion on September 18.
HARD CURRENCY RESERVES Sept 25 Sept 18 Sept '95
